title: Surgery exact sequence
summary: In the mathematical  surgery theory the surgery exact sequence is the main technical tool to calculate the surgery structure set of a compact manifold in dimension > 4 {\displaystyle >4} . The surgery structure set S ( X ) {\displaystyle {\mathcal {S}}(X)} of a compact n {\displaystyle n} -dimensional manifold X {\displaystyle X} is a pointed set which classifies n {\displaystyle n} -dimensional manifolds within the homotopy type of X {\displaystyle X} .
